markdownRemark.html: The JaxFusion user group meeting will be having their next meeting on May 2nd at 6:30 PM at Vurv Technology in Jacksonville. The presentation will cover new features in Flex 2.0, and how to integrate ColdFusion MX 7 with Flex.

frontmatter.title: JaxFusion meeting on May 2nd at Vurv Technology
JaxFusion meeting on July 11th at Vurv Technology
